Author: Ben Wilkinson
Summary: Do you manage more than a single Azure subscription and want an easy way to swap between them ?This function is short and easy to use for anyone.Step 1# install the azure module (one time) install-module az -force # run this one time Enable-AzContextAutosavelogin-azaccount  # run
Title: Easily swap between your Azure subscriptions (updated 2019 Sept)
